Rotation.desc: Rotation of the hole PXD detector (should be the same as beampipe)

Theta.desc: The tilt angle of the layer with respect to the z axis

OffsetY.desc: The offset of the center of the layer in y direction (Wind Mill structure)

OffsetZ.desc: The offset of the center of the layer in z direction

NumberOfLadders.desc: Number of ladders in this layer

PhiLadder.desc: The rotation of the whole Ladder

Ladder.desc: The silicon modules the detector is made of
